item.name: Berry Bliss
item.description: A refreshing blend of mixed berries, almond milk, and banana.

item.name: Tropical Delight
item.description: A tropical concoction featuring pineapple, mango, coconut milk, and spinach.

item.name: Green Machine
item.description: A nutrient-packed blend of kale, spinach, banana, apple, and almond milk.

item.name: Chocolate Chia
item.description: Indulge in this rich chocolatey shake with chia seeds and almond butter.

item.name: Spinach Supreme
item.description: A vibrant green smoothie packed with spinach, banana, mango, and coconut water.

item.name: Cookie Dough Bliss
item.description: A classic favorite featuring chunks of cookie dough mixed into creamy vanilla ice cream.

item.name: Chocolate Fudge Indulgence
item.description: Rich chocolate ice cream swirled with gooey fudge sauce, made entirely from plant-based ingredients.

item.name: Strawberry Sundae Surprise
item.description: Fresh strawberry ice cream topped with a decadent berry compote and whipped cream.

item.name: Lemon Blueberry Cheesecake
item.description: Tangy lemon-infused cheesecake topped with fresh blueberries, all on a crunchy almond crust.

item.name: Chocolate Avocado Mousse
item.description: Decadent chocolate mousse made with creamy avocado, sweetened with maple syrup, and topped with cocoa nibs.

item.name: Raspberry Almond Tart
item.description: Delicate almond pastry filled with raspberry compote and topped with toasted almond slices.

item.name: Caramel Pecan Brownies
item.description: Gooey caramel brownies studded with crunchy pecans, made with rich chocolate.

item.name: Coconut Chia Pudding
item.description: Creamy coconut pudding infused with chia seeds and served with a medley of tropical fruits.

item.name: Peanut Butter Banana Pie
item.description: A luscious pie made with layers of creamy peanut butter, sliced bananas, and a chocolate cookie crust.

item.name: Coconut Lime Sorbet
item.description: Refreshing coconut lime sorbet with a hint of mint, perfect for cooling off on a hot day.

item.name: Roasted Chickpeas
item.description: Crunchy chickpeas roasted with savory spices, perfect for snacking on the go.

item.name: Veggie Sushi Rolls
item.description: Colorful sushi rolls filled with avocado, cucumber, carrot, and bell pepper, served with soy sauce and wasabi.

item.name: Spicy Edamame
item.description: Steamed edamame tossed in a spicy chili garlic sauce, a flavorful and protein-packed snack.

item.name: Guacamole & Chips
item.description: Freshly made guacamole served with crispy tortilla chips, a classic favorite for dipping.

item.name: Stuffed Grape Leaves
item.description: Grape leaves stuffed with seasoned rice, pine nuts, and herbs, served with a tangy lemon tahini sauce.

item.name: Pizza Slices
item.description: Delicious pizza slices topped with marinara sauce, cheese, and assorted veggies.

item.name: Cucumber Roll-Ups
item.description: Thinly sliced cucumber rolled up with hummus, bell pepper strips, and sprouts, a refreshing and crunchy snack.

item.name: Cheese Plate
item.description: A selection of cheeses served with crackers, grapes, and fig jam, perfect for sharing.

item.name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
item.description: Creamy spinach and artichoke dip served warm with toasted bread or pita chips.

item.name: Fruit Kabobs
item.description: Assorted fresh fruits skewered and served with a drizzle of agave nectar for a sweet and refreshing treat.

item.name: Quinoa Stuffed Mushrooms
item.description: Baked mushrooms filled with quinoa, sun-dried tomatoes, and fresh herbs, a satisfying and nutritious snack.

item.name: Avocado Toast Bites
item.description: Mini avocado toast bites topped with cherry tomatoes, red onion, and balsamic glaze, a trendy and delicious snack option.

item.name: Mini Pretzel Bites
item.description: Bite-sized pretzels baked to golden perfection, served with a side of spicy mustard for dipping.

item.name: Stuffed Jalape√±os
item.description: Cream cheese and wrapped in crispy bacon made from tempeh.

item.name: Buffalo Cauliflower Bites
item.description: Crispy cauliflower fsts tossed in tangy buffalo sauce, served with ranch dressing.

item.name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
item.description: Creamy spinach and artichoke dip served warm with toasted bread or pita chips.

item.name: Garlic Hummus & Veggie Sticks
item.description: Smooth garlic hummus served with an assortment of fresh vegetable sticks for dipping.

item.name: Spicy Tofu Skewers
item.description: Marinated tofu cubes skewered and grilled to perfection, served with a side of peanut dipping sauce.
